name: gameyfin
description: Gameyfin is a self-hosted media and game cataloging platform using Jellyfin UI principles. It allows adding ROMs, metadata scraping, and browsing games via web UI, ideal for retro or modern gaming setups.
features: ROM Cataloging: Index and organize ROMs and game files with automatic metadata scraping from online databases.
Jellyfin-Style Interface: Browse your game collection through a familiar, media-server-inspired web UI.
Metadata Scraping: Automatically fetch game information, artwork, and descriptions for comprehensive cataloging.
Retro Gaming Focus: Optimized for retro game collections with support for classic console ROMs and emulators.
Web-Based Browser: Access your game library from any device through a responsive web interface.
Modern Game Support: Catalog both retro ROMs and modern game installations in a unified platform.
Media Integration: Combine game and media cataloging using Jellyfin's proven UI design principles.
Self-Hosted Library: Maintain complete control over your gaming collection without cloud dependencies.
